title: "The World's Unluckiest Nat 20" - Running the Gauntlet Lvl 2
itunes:title: "The World's Unluckiest Nat 20" - Running the Gauntlet Lvl 2
description:
Welcome back, sports fans! This week, Jeremy jumps into the DM chair to show you why he had to drop the "friendly" from his title, as our newly Level 2 characters get ready to Run the Gauntlet! You're gonna want to be sitting down for this one, folks! It's one of the funniest combats we've ever run!

Want more 3BH in your life?
You can now buy merchandise here! 

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including Campfire Chats where we dive into each episode of Outlaws & Obelisks.

Find all of our stuff here: https://linktr.ee/TBHalflings

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @3blackhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
